title: t206 Homerun Baker-piedmont 460 fact. 42 for trade
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: t206 Homerun Baker-piedmont 460 fact. 42 for trade
posts.post_content:
I would like to trade this Baker pied fact. 42 for a Baker
with a different back(not Piedmont or Sweet Cap).
Also looking for a Chesbro or Joss.

Email with any questions.  [URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]


[IMG]http://i732.photobucket.com/albums/ww326/mhgt76528/t206%20HOF%20collection/Baker.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i732.photobucket.com/albums/ww326/mhgt76528/t206%20HOF%20collection/Bakerback.jpg[/IMG]
Still looking for another Baker or Chesbro to trade.
